question.questionA: Leaves  palmately  lobed;  ‘fruit’  a  pear-shaped  fleshy structure, enclosing a collection of seed-like achenes.
question.questionB: Leaves entire; ‘fruit’ a collection of druplets.

question.questionA: Leaves 6-20 cm, oval to cordate, roughly hairy above, softly hairy below; fruit dark red when ripe.
question.questionB: Leaves 6-20 cm, oval  to cordate, smooth and shiny above, almost hairless below, fruit white, pink or pale purple.
